name: 5 More Minutes (Fimmeh)
description:
5 More Minutes is a game, where the character is doing the most dangerous thing in the world, closing his eyes after turning the alarm off. Your job is to beat the game within the time limit or otherwise the character will keep on sleeping. If you do manage to get through the game in time, you will manage to wake up and start your day. 

* This game was made in 3 weeks as the final piece of an 3 month course.
